locale.text: Enables using event zones and linking tasks to them
Listing the types is possible with <ItemId:SubId,ItemId:SubId,...>
Listing the types is possible with <ItemId:SubId,ItemId:SubId,...>
Listing the types is possible with <ItemId:SubId,ItemId:SubId,...>
No additional help available!
No additional help available!
Listing the types is possible with <ItemId:SubId,ItemId:SubId,...>
Listing the types is possible with <ItemId:SubId,ItemId:SubId,...>
No additional help available!
Listing the types is possible with <ItemId:SubId,ItemId:SubId,...>
No additional help available!
No additional help available!
The messages also support colors (e.g. &c for red)
The messages also support colors (e.g. &c for red)
Possible arguments are 'clear', '<EffectName>' and '<EffectName> <Duration> <Strength>'
Write '<World> <X> <Y> <Z> [<Yaw> <Pitch>]'
You need to specify an item (e.g. a shovel/the Id 269)
§redThe event zone §gold{0}§red has not been found!
§redThe key §gold{0}§red has not been found!
§redThe event zone collides with the other event zone §gold{0}§red!
§darkgreenThe event zone §gold{0}§darkgreen has been created!
§darkgreenCreation of an event zone has been {If,{0}}§greenstarted{Else}§redaborted{EndIf}§darkgreen!
§darkgreenThe event zone §gold{0}§darkgreen and all related keys has been removed!
§redThere are currently no keys related to the event zone §gold{0}§red!
§darkgreenThere are currently §gold{1}§darkgreen keys related to the event zone §gold{0}§darkgreen:
§darkgreenType: §gold{0}§darkgreen, State: §gold{If{1}}positive{Else}negative{EndIf}, Extra: §gold{2}
§redThe key §gold{0}§red has already been set for the event zone §gold{1}§red!
§darkgreenThe key §gold{0}§darkgreen has been added to the event zone §gold{1}§darkgreen!
§redThe event zone §gold{0}§red does not contain the key §gold{1}§red!
§darkgreenThe key §gold{0}§darkgreen has been removed from the event zone §gold{1}§darkgreen!
§darkgreenThere are §gold{0}§darkgreen keys: §gold{1}
§darkgreenInformation about the key §gold{0}§darkgreen (Id: §gold{1}§darkgreen):
§darkgreenAdditional arguments: {If,{0}}§greenYes, are possible{Else}§redNo, are not used{EndIf}
§darkgreen: Hint: §gold{0}
